ygData.subject: Re: Yonder is a Wizard Spell again!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah I saw this too at the Erudin guild. Ok . now what does Yonder do ? ... _________________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Get your
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah I saw this too at the Erudin guild.
Ok . now what does Yonder do ?


--- mstokes <mstokes@...> wrote:
> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> I was in Qeynos updating my spell book. I ran into
> the spell Yonder and
> this time it came back as a Wizard only spell. This
> means that Verant
> either remodified Yonder, or their are two varieties
> of the spell, and
> Akanon merchants carry the wrong copy. Also Bonds
> of Force is a level
> 29 spell based on Alteration and costs 15 mana to
> cast. Has anybody
> tried it? Is it a new variety of Root?
>
